meta.name: Agile Project Generator with ClickUp Task Hierarchy using GPT-5 & Forms

parameters.text:
=You are a naming expert and technical writer.  
Your task is to clean up and enhance the following rough input into a professional-sounding **project name** and **concise, clear project description**, and generate a suitable **Jira project key**.

The project key must be 5 uppercase letters, randomly generated and not necessarily related to the project name. For example, it could be "XQJTR" or "MBZKD"

Return only the result in JSON format with three fields: `project_name`, `project_description`, and `project_key`.

---

### Input:
Raw Project Name: `{{ $json['Project Name'] }}`  
Raw Project Description: `{{ $json['Project Full Features'] }}`

---

### Output format:
```json
{
  "project_name": "Clean and professional project name here",
  "project_description": "Clear and concise one-paragraph description of the project with technical clarity and business relevance.",
  "project_key": "ABCDE"
}
```

Only return the JSON. Do not include any commentary or explanation.

parameters.subject: Project successfully generated

parameters.content:
# üëã Hi, I‚Äôm Billy

I help businesses build **n8n workflows** & **AI automation projects**.  
Need help with n8n or AI Automation projects? 
Contact me and let‚Äôs build your automation together.

üì© **Email:** billychartanto@gmail.com  
ü§ù **n8n Creator:** [n8n.io/creators/billy](https://n8n.io/creators/billy/)
üåê **My n8n Projects:** [billychristi.com/n8n](https://www.billychristi.com/n8n)  



---
üí° Feel free to get in touch if you‚Äôd like help on your next automation project or if you have any feedback or thoughts to share.

## üöÄ ClickUp Project Generator & ClickUp Task Creator with Form Interface using GPT-5

What This Template Does:

- Accepts project details through a web form (Project Name and Full Features description)
- Uses OpenAI GPT-5 to intelligently clean up and enhance project names and descriptions
- Generates professional Jira-style project keys (5 random uppercase letters)
- Creates comprehensive task breakdowns following Agile best practices with user story format
- Automatically generates detailed sub-tasks for each main task with proper descriptions
- Creates the complete project structure in ClickUp with lists, tasks, and sub-tasks
- Sends email notifications upon successful project creation with direct ClickUp links
- Processes everything through AI-driven automation for consistent, professional project setup

## üìã WORKFLOW PROCESS OVERVIEW

Step 1: üìù Form Trigger captures project details through "Jira Full Project Generator" web form
Step 2: ü§ñ Project Naming (AI Agent) uses OpenAI to clean up project name, create professional description, and generate random project key
Step 3: üìä ClickUp Create List establishes the main project list in ClickUp workspace
Step 4: üß† Clickup Project Task Generator (AI Agent) analyzes project features and creates detailed task breakdown following Agile user story format
Step 5: üì§ Split Out breaks down the AI-generated task array into individual items
Step 6: üîÑ Loop Over Items processes each main task individually through batch processing
Step 7: ‚úÖ ClickUp Create Task creates each main task with descriptions in the project list
Step 8: üîÄ Split Out1 extracts sub-tasks from each main task for individual processing
Step 9: ‚ö° Execute Workflow triggers the sub-workflow to create all sub-tasks with proper parent-child relationships
Step 10: üìß Gmail sends success notification email with project link and list ID
Step 11: üîÅ Sub-workflow Loop handles individual sub-task creation in ClickUp with parent task relationships

## SETUP REQUIRED

Workflow Configurations:
- Update the Gmail node email address from "n8n_test_result_replace_me@yopmail.com" to your actual email
- Configure ClickUp team ID (currently: 9014828465) and space ID (currently: 90143504524) for your workspace
- Adjust the Execute Workflow node to reference the correct sub-workflow ID for subtask creation
- Update the form webhook URL and form fields as needed

Required Credentials:
- OpenAI API Key
- ClickUp API Credential
- Gmail OAuth2 Credential

## Gmail - Send Notification
You can adjust the subject & body of the notification here.
Also, update the recipient email.

## Create List
Configuration:
Update the ClickUp credentials with yours.

When Executed by Another Workflow.subtask_title: the quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog
When Executed by Another Workflow.subtask_description: the quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog
